Description

File Globbing

Author

Lexikos

Source

https://​autohotkey​.com​/board​/topic​/26846-wildcard-folders​/​#entry173593

Categories

License

Functions
Glob
Glob(
ByRef list,
Pattern,
IncludeDirs:= 0
)

glob iterates the given path pattern, returning a list of matched directory entries

Parameters
list
ByRef

list with found patterns to be returned

pattern
ByRef

path pattern to matched

IncludeDirs
ByRef

flag to include directories in matched pathes (else only files will be matched)

Returns

list of matched path patterns

Example
Glob(list, "C:\Program Files\?u*y\*\*.exe")
MsgBox %list%
